descriptionHtml:
[quote][b][color=#ffff00][size=5]ï»¿SEE VIDEOOOOOOOOS[/size][/color][/b][/quote]



requires HDT Physics Extensions and SKSE of course.

only for male and coats. match them with your own gloves or shoes.



dragonscale light armor, daedric heavy armor, and clothing properties are available.

can be crafted with material perk. about clothing, requires snow or cave bear pelt and tanning rack.


MAYBE SOME CLIPPING ISSUES in specific motions, but no more patch is planed. I did my best.


do whatever you want with these stuffs, I don't care at all really.
author: goldiocks
